nodes.bodyText: Which would you prefer, the javadoc on the interface, the implementation, or both?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -92,6 +92,16 @@ public boolean isFirstRound() { Collection removeNonCombatants(Side side); + /** + * Mark the units that will be dying + * + *

Units that are only damaged should not be passed into this method. + * + * @param casualties units that are dying + * @param side the side the unit are on + */ + void markCasualties(Collection casualties, Side side);

nodes.bodyText: IMO interface to explain the general contract that is expected to be provided by any implementation.
